title: Time of Tides
description: What if Global Warming wasn't just down to Climate Change? What if it was down to something else? As the worst storm of all time hits the entire globe and as all across the world rivers burst their banks and the oceans start to rise, one family take to the Norfolk Broads to try and escape the floods. Little do they know their nightmare is just beginning...because as they are about to find out, nowhere is safe!
author: Mark  Woods
